data.eml:eml: Mexican species of the genus Exenterus Hartig (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae: Tryphoninae) reared from diprionid hosts

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ruíz-Cancino, Enrique, Khalaim, Andrey I. (2015): Mexican species of the genus Exenterus Hartig (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae: Tryphoninae) reared from diprionid hosts. Zootaxa 4048 (1): 140-150, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4048.1.9
